rComments: Best and most favorite Prof. It is very rare that you can come across a teacher that is passionate about her/his subject and is able to convey that passion to a class. Nouma is extremely knowledgable as well and is a seriously gifted teacher. She's very conscientious and very approachable and is always willing to talk and help. She's so sweet too!

Nouma is simply awesome.  Every class is super interesting and she is so brilliant and laid back and so full of energy at the same time she is very encouraging and supportive of you to do your best. She is very fair in her grading and evaluations and totally rocks the house. Thanks/shukran Nouma!
Nouma is easily the best professor I have ever had. Insightful, hilarious, patient, quick, one can't take one's eyes off her for a second because she is so intelligent and engaging.

One of the best profs in my entire college experience. Energetic and thought-provoking, she's very good at engaging students. I'd have taken ten more courses with her, if I could have! If you have the chance to take a class with Nouma, take it. It will change you.

Nouma is one of the most patient instructors I have ever had. Although her courses are tough, she goes beyond the expected and sincerely wants her students to succeed. She projects the highest respect for her students and the material she is teaching. She is quick-witted, well-read and highly informed. Her expertise is much needed.

Oh My God! The ABSOLUTE worst teacher I have ever taken! The first day of class she was 20 minutes late, didnt introduce herself, offer a syllabus, no textbook! None of the bookstores heard of the class where she supposedly had a reader on order, she never showed up the 3rd class, then summer session cancelled the class, and no one heard from her!
She's a very passionate professor, as well as a graduate student and she is very tough in Arabic 1 then becomes more friendly. Has favorites, if you do all your work :)

Nouma is an exceptional teacher. She can be incredibly demanding of you and deals with students on a "tough love" sort of basis. At the same time, however, she's willing to help you whenever you need it and she has an evident passion for arabic and teaching it.

Nouma Issa, is brilliant, funny, caring, and ultimately demanding.  She is patient and willing to speak to you about anything outside of class, and she is amazingly knowledgeable about history and language, so it's worth your time to seek her out.  She is so sweet! Noheboukee ya Nouma!
